amendatorysection.catchline: Wheeling service; contract; dispute; exception; board; settlement.
amendatorysection.para: When a power agency has requested wheeling service under sections 70-626.01 to 70-626.03, the parties shall develop a contract for such wheeling service. Any provisions of the contract which cannot be resolved by the parties shall then be the subject of a dispute filed with the board for settlement. The provisions of this section shall not include the matter of rates to be paid for such wheeling service in the contract.
